congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By a unanimous vote of 89 yeas (Vote No. 143), Senate passed H.R. 5985, to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend certain expiring provisions of law administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
